headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods raised funding to scale its precision-fermentation platform for vegan dairy production.

headline: Modern Meadow Bio-Leather Alternative Production Expansion
summary: Modern Meadow scales production of its bio-leather alternative using cell-based manufacturing.

headline: Solar Foods Begins Commercial Production of Solein Protein
summary: Solar Foods initiates commercial-scale production of Solein, a protein created via gas fermentation.

headline: Algiknit Raises Series A for Seaweed-Based Yarns
summary: Algiknit secured Series A funding to expand production of its biodegradable yarns made from seaweed.

headline: Perfect Day Partners with Nestle on Vegan Ice Cream
summary: Perfect Day collaborates with Nestle to develop and launch vegan ice cream using its animal-free dairy.

headline: MycoWorks Announces New Reishi Production Facility
summary: MycoWorks expands production capacity for Reishi, its mycelium-based leather alternative.

headline: Nature's Fynd Launches Fy Protein-Based Meat Alternatives
summary: Nature's Fynd releases new meat alternatives made with its Fy protein, produced through fermentation.

headline: Mango Materials Secures Funding for PHA Production Scale-Up
summary: Mango Materials obtains funding to scale up production of PHA, a biodegradable plastic alternative.

headline: Air Protein Receives Regulatory Approval for Air-Based Protein
summary: Air Protein gains regulatory approval for its protein created from air using gas fermentation technology.

headline: Checkerspot Announces WNDR Alpine Partnership for Algae-Based Skis
summary: Checkerspot partners with WNDR Alpine to develop high-performance skis using algae-based materials.
